string.name: /identification/bounding_polygon
string.annotation: OGR compatible WKT representation of bounding polygon of the image

string.name: /identification/burst_id
string.annotation: Burst identification string (burst ID)

string.name: /identification/instrument_name
string.annotation: Instrument name

string.name: /identification/is_geocoded
string.annotation: Boolean indicating if product is in radar geometry or geocoded

string.name: /identification/look_direction
string.annotation: Look direction can be left or right

string.name: /identification/mission_id
string.annotation: Mission identifier

string.name: /identification/orbit_pass_direction
string.annotation: Orbit pass direction can be ascending or descending

string.name: /identification/processing_center
string.annotation: Name of the processing center that produced the product

string.name: /identification/processing_date_time
string.annotation: Data processing date and time

string.name: /identification/product_level
string.annotation: L0A: Unprocessed instrument data; L0B: Reformatted, unprocessed instrument data; L1: Processed instrument data in radar coordinates system; and L2: Processed instrument data in geocoded coordinates system

string.name: /identification/product_specification_version
string.annotation: CSLC-S1 product specification version

string.name: /identification/product_type
string.annotation: Product type

string.name: /identification/product_version
string.annotation: CSLC-S1 product version

string.name: /identification/radar_band
string.annotation: Radar band

string.name: /identification/zero_doppler_end_time
string.annotation: Azimuth stop time of product

string.name: /identification/zero_doppler_start_time
string.annotation: Azimuth start time of product

real.name: /data/y_spacing
real.annotation: Spacing of the geographical grid along Y-direction

real.name: /data/x_spacing
real.annotation: Spacing of the geographical grid along X-direction

annotation.inverse_flattening: Inverse flattening of the ellipsoidal figure

real.name: /data/x_coordinates
real.annotation: CF compliant dimension associated with the X coordinate

real.name: /data/y_coordinates
real.annotation: CF compliant dimension associated with the Y coordinate

real.name: /data/azimuth_carrier_phase
real.annotation: Azimuth carrier phase

real.name: /data/flattening_phase
real.annotation: Flattening phase

annotation.inverse_flattening: Inverse flattening of the ellipsoidal figure

real.name: /metadata/calibration_information/y_spacing
real.annotation: Spacing of the geographical grid along Y-direction

real.name: /metadata/calibration_information/x_spacing
real.annotation: Spacing of the geographical grid along X-direction

string.name: /metadata/calibration_information/azimuth_time
string.annotation: Start time (format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.6f)

real.name: /metadata/calibration_information/beta_naught
real.annotation: Beta naught

real.name: /metadata/calibration_information/x_coordinates
real.annotation: CF compliant dimension associated with the X coordinate

real.name: /metadata/calibration_information/y_coordinates
real.annotation: CF compliant dimension associated with the Y coordinate

real.name: /metadata/calibration_information/dn
real.annotation: Geocoded DN

real.name: /metadata/calibration_information/gamma
real.annotation: Geocoded gamma

real.name: /metadata/calibration_information/sigma_naught
real.annotation: Geocoded sigma naught

annotation.inverse_flattening: Inverse flattening of the ellipsoidal figure

real.name: /metadata/noise_information/y_spacing
real.annotation: Spacing of the geographical grid along Y-direction

real.name: /metadata/noise_information/x_spacing
real.annotation: Spacing of the geographical grid along X-direction

string.name: /metadata/noise_information/range_azimuth_time
string.annotation: Start time (format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.6f)

real.name: /metadata/noise_information/x_coordinates
real.annotation: CF compliant dimension associated with the X coordinate

real.name: /metadata/noise_information/y_coordinates
real.annotation: CF compliant dimension associated with the Y coordinate

real.name: /metadata/noise_information/thermal_noise_lut
real.annotation: Geocoded thermal noise LUT

string.name: /metadata/orbit/reference_epoch
string.annotation: Reference epoch of the state vectors (format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.6f)

string.name: /metadata/orbit/orbit_direction
string.annotation: Direction of sensor orbit ephemeris (e.g., ascending, descending)

string.name: /metadata/orbit/orbit_type
string.annotation: Type of orbit file used for processing. RESORB: restituted orbit ephemeris or POEORB: precise orbit ephemeris

real.name: /metadata/orbit/position_x
real.annotation: Platform position along x-direction with respect to the WGS84 G1762 reference frame

real.name: /metadata/orbit/position_y
real.annotation: Platform position along y-direction with respect to the WGS84 G1762 reference frame

real.name: /metadata/orbit/position_z
real.annotation: Platform position along z-direction with respect to the WGS84 G1762 reference frame

real.name: /metadata/orbit/velocity_x
real.annotation: Platform velocity along x-direction with respect to the WGS84 G1762 reference frame

real.name: /metadata/orbit/velocity_y
real.annotation: Platform velocity along y-direction with respect to the WGS84 G1762 reference frame

real.name: /metadata/orbit/velocity_z
real.annotation: Platform velocity along z-direction with respect to the WGS84 G1762 reference frame

real.name: /metadata/orbit/time
real.annotation: Time of the orbit state vectors relative to the reference epoch

string.name: /metadata/processing_information/runconfig
string.annotation: Run configuration file used to generate the CSLC-S1 product

string.name: /metadata/processing_information/algorithms/COMPASS_version
string.annotation: COMPASS (CSLC-S1 processor) version used for processing

string.name: /metadata/processing_information/algorithms/ISCE3_version
string.annotation: ISCE3 version used for processing

string.name: /metadata/processing_information/algorithms/s1_reader_version
string.annotation: S1 reader version used for processing

string.name: /metadata/processing_information/algorithms/dem_interpolation
string.annotation: DEM interpolation method

string.name: /metadata/processing_information/algorithms/complex_data_geocoding_interpolator
string.annotation: Complex data geocoding interpolation method

string.name: /metadata/processing_information/algorithms/float_data_geocoding_interpolator
string.annotation: Floating-point data geocoding interpolation method

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/input_burst_metadata/azimuth_steering_rate
real.annotation: Azimuth steering rate of IW and EW modes

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/input_burst_metadata/azimuth_time_interval
real.annotation: Time spacing between azimuth lines of the burst

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/input_burst_metadata/center
real.annotation: Longitude, latitude center of burst

string.name: /metadata/processing_information/input_burst_metadata/ipf_version
string.annotation: ESA Instrument Processing Facility software version

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/input_burst_metadata/iw2_mid_range
real.annotation: Slant range of the middle of the IW2 swath

string.name: /metadata/processing_information/input_burst_metadata/platform_id
string.annotation: Sensor platform identification string (e.g., S1A or S1B)

string.name: /metadata/processing_information/input_burst_metadata/polarization
string.annotation: Polarization of the burst

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/input_burst_metadata/prf_raw_data
real.annotation: Pulse repetition frequency (PRF) of the raw data

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/input_burst_metadata/radar_center_frequency
real.annotation: Radar center frequency

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/input_burst_metadata/range_bandwidth
real.annotation: Slant range bandwidth of the signal

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/input_burst_metadata/range_chirp_rate
real.annotation: Range chirp rate

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/input_burst_metadata/range_pixel_spacing
real.annotation: Pixel spacing between slant range samples in the input burst SLC

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/input_burst_metadata/range_sampling_rate
real.annotation: Sampling rate of slant range in the input burst SLC

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/input_burst_metadata/range_window_coefficient
real.annotation: Value of the weighting window coefficient used during processing

string.name: /metadata/processing_information/input_burst_metadata/range_window_type
string.annotation: Name of the weighting window type used during processing

integer.name: /metadata/processing_information/input_burst_metadata/rank
integer.annotation: The number of Pulse Repetition Intervals (PRI) between transmitted pulse and return echo

string.name: /metadata/processing_information/input_burst_metadata/sensing_start
string.annotation: Sensing start time of the burst (format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.6f)

string.name: /metadata/processing_information/input_burst_metadata/sensing_stop
string.annotation: Sensing stop time of the burst (format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.6f)

integer.name: /metadata/processing_information/input_burst_metadata/shape
integer.annotation: Shape (length, width) of the burst in radar coordinates

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/input_burst_metadata/slant_range_time
real.annotation: Two-way slant range time of Doppler centroid frequency estimate

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/input_burst_metadata/starting_range
real.annotation: Slant range of the first sample of the input burst

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/input_burst_metadata/wavelength
real.annotation: Wavelength of the transmitted signal

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/input_burst_metadata/azimuth_fm_rate/coeffs
real.annotation: Coefficients of the polynomial

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/input_burst_metadata/azimuth_fm_rate/mean
real.annotation: Mean of the polynomial

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/input_burst_metadata/azimuth_fm_rate/std
real.annotation: Standard deviation of polynomial

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/input_burst_metadata/doppler/coeffs
real.annotation: Coefficients of the polynomial

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/input_burst_metadata/doppler/mean
real.annotation: Mean of the polynomial

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/input_burst_metadata/azimuth_fm_rate/std
real.annotation: Standard deviation of the polynomial

string.name: /metadata/processing_information/inputs/calibration_files
string.annotation: List of input calibration files used for processing

string.name: /metadata/processing_information/inputs/dem_source
string.annotation: Description of the DEM used for processing

string.name: /metadata/processing_information/inputs/l1_slc_files
string.annotation: List of input L1 RSLC file used for processing

string.name: /metadata/processing_information/inputs/noise_files
string.annotation: List of input noise files used for processing

string.name: /metadata/processing_information/inputs/orbit_files
string.annotation: List of input orbit files used for processing

integer.name: /metadata/processing_information/inputs/burst_location_parameters/burst_index
integer.annotation: Burst index relative other bursts in swath

integer.name: /metadata/processing_information/inputs/burst_location_parameters/first_valid_line
integer.annotation: First valid line for burst in measurement tiff

integer.name: /metadata/processing_information/inputs/burst_location_parameters/first_valid_sample
integer.annotation: First valid sample for burst in measurement tiff

integer.name: /metadata/processing_information/inputs/burst_location_parameters/last_valid_line
integer.annotation: First valid sample for burst in measurement tiff

integer.name: /metadata/processing_information/inputs/burst_location_parameters/last_valid_sample
integer.annotation: Last valid sample for burst in measurement tiff

string.name: /metadata/processing_information/inputs/burst_location_parameters/tiff_path
string.annotation: Path to measurement tiff file inside the SAFE file

bool.name: /metadata/processing_information/parameters/azimuth_fm_rate_applied
bool.annotation: If True, azimuth FM-rate mismatch timing correction has been applied

bool.name: /metadata/processing_information/parameters/azimuth_solid_earth_tides_applied
bool.annotation: If True, solid Earth tides correction has been applied in azimuth direction

bool.name: /metadata/processing_information/parameters/bistatic_delay_applied
bool.annotation: If True, bistatic delay timing correction has been applied

bool.name: /metadata/processing_information/parameters/dry_troposphere_weather_model_applied
bool.annotation: If True, dry troposphere correction based on weather model has been applied

string.name: /metadata/processing_information/parameters/elevation_antenna_pattern_correction_applied
string.annotation: Elevation antenna pattern correction. OPERA: correction applied by s1-reader and COMPASS. ESA: correction was applied by ESA. None: when the correction was not applied.

bool.name: /metadata/processing_information/parameters/ellipsoidal_flattening_applied
bool.annotation: If True, CSLC-S1 phase has been flattened with respect to a zero height ellipsoid

bool.name: /metadata/processing_information/parameters/geometry_doppler_applied
bool.annotation: If True, geometry steering doppler timing correction has been applied

bool.name: /metadata/processing_information/parameters/ionosphere_tec_applied
bool.annotation: If True, ionosphere correction based on TEC data has been applied

bool.name: /metadata/processing_information/parameters/los_solid_earth_tides_applied
bool.annotation: If True, solid Earth tides correction has been applied in slant range direction

bool.name: /metadata/processing_information/parameters/static_troposphere_applied
bool.annotation: If True, troposphere correction based on a static model has been applied

bool.name: /metadata/processing_information/parameters/topographic_flattening_applied
bool.annotation: If True, CSLC-S1 phase has been flattened with respect to topographic height using a DEM

bool.name: /metadata/processing_information/parameters/wet_troposphere_weather_model_applied
bool.annotation: If True, wet troposphere correction based on weather model has been applied

real.name: metadata/processing_information/timing_corrections/slant_range_spacing
real.annotation: Spacing of slant range of LUT data

real.name: metadata/processing_information/timing_corrections/zero_doppler_time_spacing
real.annotation: Azimuth time of LUT data

real.name: metadata/processing_information/timing_corrections/slant_range
real.annotation: Slant range of LUT data

real.name: metadata/processing_information/timing_corrections/zero_doppler_time
real.annotation: Azimuth time of LUT data

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/timing_corrections/azimuth_fm_rate_mismatch
real.annotation: Azimuth FM-rate mismatch mitigation (azimuth) correction as a function of slant range and azimuth time

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/timing_corrections/azimuth_solid_earth_tides
real.annotation: Solid Earth tides (azimuth) correction as a function of slant range and azimuth time

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/timing_corrections/bistatic_delay
real.annotation: Bistatic delay (azimuth) correction as a function of slant range and azimuth time

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/timing_corrections/geometry_steering_doppler
real.annotation: Geometry steering Doppler (range) correction as a function of slant range and azimuth time

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/timing_corrections/los_ionospheric_delay
real.annotation: Ionospheric delay (range) correction as a function of slant range and azimuth time

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/timing_corrections/los_solid_earth_tides
real.annotation: Solid Earth tides (range) correction as a function of slant range and azimuth time

string.name: /metadata/processing_information/timing_corrections/extended_coefficients/doppler_centroid_azimuth_time
string.annotation: Azimuth time for doppler centroid coefficient data (format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.6f)

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/timing_corrections/extended_coefficients/doppler_centroid_coefficients
real.annotation: Doppler centroid coefficient data

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/timing_corrections/extended_coefficients/doppler_centroid_slant_range_time
real.annotation: Slant range time for doppler centroid coefficient data

string.name: /metadata/processing_information/timing_corrections/extended_coefficients/fm_rate_azimuth_time
string.annotation: Azimuth time for FM rate coefficient data (format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.6f)

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/timing_corrections/extended_coefficients/fm_rate_coefficients
real.annotation: FM rate coefficient data

real.name: /metadata/processing_information/timing_corrections/extended_coefficients/fm_rate_slant_range_time
real.annotation: Slant range time for FM rate coefficient data

string.name: /metadata/quality_assurance/orbit_information/orbit_type
string.annotation: Type of orbit file used in processing. RESORB: restituted orbit ephemeris or POEORB: precise orbit ephemeris

real.name: /metadata/quality_assurance/pixel_classification/percent_land_pixels
real.annotation: Percentage of output pixels labeled as land

real.name: /metadata/quality_assurance/pixel_classification/percent_valid_pixels
real.annotation: Percentage of output pixels are valid

bool.name: /metadata/quality_assurance/rfi_information/VV/is_rfi_info_available
bool.annotation: Whether or not RFI information is available

string.name: /quality_assurance/rfi_information/VV/rfi_burst_report/azimuth_time
string.annotation: Azimuth time of the burst report

real.name: /quality_assurance/rfi_information/VV/rfi_burst_report/frequency_domain_rfi_report/isolated_rfi_report/max_percentage_affected_bw
real.annotation: Max percentage of bandwidth affected by isolated RFI in a single line

real.name: /quality_assurance/rfi_information/VV/rfi_burst_report/ frequency_domain_rfi_report /isolated_rfi_report/percentage_affected_lines
real.annotation: Percentage of level-0 lines affected by isolated RFI

real.name: /quality_assurance/rfi_information/VV/rfi_burst_report/frequency_domain_rfi_report/max_percentage_bw_affected_persistent_rfi
real.annotation: Max percentage bandwidth affected by persistent RFI in a single processing block

integer.name: /quality_assurance/rfi_information/VV/rfi_burst_report/frequency_domain_rfi_report/num_sub_blocks
integer.annotation: Number of sub-blocks in the current burst

real.name: /quality_assurance/rfi_information/VV/rfi_burst_report/frequency_domain_rfi_report/percentage_blocks_persistent_rfi
real.annotation: Percentage of processing blocks affected by persistent RFI. In this case, the RFI detection is performed on the mean PSD of each processing block

integer.name: /quality_assurance/rfi_information/VV/rfi_burst_report/frequency_domain_rfi_report/sub_block_size
integer.annotation: Number of lines in each sub-block

real.name: /quality_assurance/rfi_information/VV/rfi_burst_report/in_band_out_band_power_ratio
real.annotation: Ratio between the in-band and out-of-band power of the burst

string.name: /quality_assurance/rfi_information/VV/rfi_burst_report/swath
string.annotation: Swath of the burst

real.name: /quality_assurance/rfi_information/VV/rfi_burst_report/time_domain_rfi_report/avg_percentage_affected_samples
real.annotation: Average percentage of affected Level-0 samples in the lines containing RFI

real.name: /quality_assurance/rfi_information/VV/rfi_burst_report/time_domain_rfi_report/max_percentage_affected_samples
real.annotation: Maximum percentage of Level-0 samples affected by RFI in the same line

real.name: /quality_assurance/rfi_information/VV/rfi_burst_report/time_domain_rfi_report/percentage_affected_lines
real.annotation: Percentage of Level-0 lines affected by RFI

string.name: /quality_assurance/rfi_information/VV/rfi_burst_report/rfi_mitigation_domain
string.annotation: Domain the RFI mitigation step was performed

string.name: /quality_assurance/rfi_information/VV/rfi_burst_report/rfi_mitigation_performed
string.annotation: Activation strategy of the RFI mitigation [“never”, “BasedOnNoiseMeas”, “always”]

real.annotation: Max of phase of VV geocoded SLC

real.annotation: Mean of phase of VV geocoded SLC

shape.name: CSLCProductWidth
shape.annotation: Number of pixels in CSLC-S1 product imagery datasets

shape.name: CSLCProductLength
shape.annotation: Number of lines in CSLC-S1 product imagery datasets

shape.name: CSLCProductShape
shape.annotation: Shape associated with CSLC-S1 imagery datasets

shape.name: correctionsLUTWidth
shape.annotation: Number of pixels in timing corrections look-up table datasets

shape.name: correctionsLUTLength
shape.annotation: Number of lines in timing corrections look-up table datasets

shape.name: correctionsLUTShape
shape.annotation: Shape associated with timing corrections look-up table datasets

shape.name: LUTWidth
shape.annotation: Number of pixels in calibration and noise corrections look-up table datasets

shape.name: LUTLength
shape.annotation: Number of lines in calibration and noise corrections look-up table datasets

shape.name: LUTShape
shape.annotation: Shape associated with calibration and noise corrections look-up table datasets

shape.name: orbitLength
shape.annotation: Length of orbit state vector datasets

shape.name: 2DShape
shape.annotation: Shape of metadata being a vector with two elements

shape.name: polynomialCoefficientsLength
shape.annotation: Number of lines in the polynomial coefficients datasets

shape.name: polynomialCoefficientsWidth
shape.annotation: Number of pixels in the polynomial coefficients datasets

shape.name: polynomialCoefficientsShape
shape.annotation: Shape associated with the polynomial coefficients datasets
